name: Ethan's Classic TeeEE
description: Premium cotton tee with sophisticated typography and custom graphics. The go-to piece for any Mitzvah celebration.

name: Crewneck Sweatshirt Ethan
description: Heavyweight crewneck with custom embroidery and premium finishes. Perfect for cool-weather celebrations.

name: Zip-Up Hoodie
description: Full-zip hoodie with custom design, premium heavyweight fleece. A crowd-favorite party favor.

name: Tank Top
description: Relaxed-fit tank with vibrant custom prints. Great for summer celebrations and beach-theme parties.

name: Crop Top
description: Trendy cropped tee with custom prints. A fun option for dance floor-ready party looks.

name: Pullover Hoodie
description: Classic pullover hoodie with kangaroo pocket. Custom designed and manufactured on premium blanks.

name: Joggers
description: Tapered joggers with custom graphics and elastic cuffs. Perfect paired with a matching hoodie or crew.

name: Shorts
description: Custom mesh or fleece shorts. Great for active celebrations, sports themes, and summer events.

name: Snapback Hat
description: Structured snapback cap with custom embroidery. A classic swag bag must-have.

name: Dad Hat
description: Relaxed-fit unstructured cap with custom embroidery. Casual, comfortable, and universally flattering.

name: Beanie
description: Knit beanie with embroidered logo. Perfect for winter celebrations and ski-themed parties.

name: Drawstring Bag
description: Custom printed drawstring backpack. The perfect vessel for swag bag goodies.

name: Tote Bag
description: Heavy-duty canvas tote with custom artwork. A reusable keepsake guests will actually use.

name: Fanny Pack
description: Custom fanny pack with adjustable strap. Hands-free party vibes for the dance floor.

name: Pajama Set
description: Matching pajama top and bottoms with all-over custom print. Perfect for slumber party after-parties.

name: Sleep Mask
description: Satin sleep mask with embroidered text. A fun sleepover party add-on.

name: Robe
description: Plush embroidered robe with custom monogram. Getting-ready glam for the guest of honor and crew.

name: Socks
description: Custom crew socks with all-over print design. A fun swag table extra everyone loves.
